short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension enables usage of spectrophotometers inside of app.colorcheck.io.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables usage of spectrophotometers within the web application https://app.colorcheck.io. It is required in order to allow Colorcheck to read density and colorimetry (lab) data with your spectrophotometer, so that you can store, analyze and compare it with well-known colors.
Several devices are supported, like the X-rite i1, and eXact, Konica Minolta FD7 and Myiro.
For more information, you can have a look at https://www.colorcheck.io
